1382560.name: TOUHOU SKY ARENA BATTLE SOUNDTRACKS
1382560.description:
The official soundtrack of spell-battle action game Touhou Sky Arena.

With a large volume of all 100 battle soundtracks, including exclusive tracks added for Game Consoles and Steam releases.
An on-parade of magnificent Touhou arrangements, performed by famous Japanese Doujin Circles such as Rokugen Alice, BUTAOTOME, A-One, C-CLAYS and Yuuhei Satellite to heat up the battles to infinity!

*10 Tracks, which will be released later on the DLC are included.
*Specially offered non-exclusive tracks are not included.
